General.Name: Gelecek Varlik Yonetimi AS
General.Description: Gelecek Varlik Yönetimi AS operates as a financial institution in Turkey. It provides corporate and financial restructuring to companies; and consultancy and intermediary services. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Gelecek Varlik Yönetimi Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of Fiba Holding Anonim Sirketi.
